cause.description:
People are dying because the EPA and FDA banned the use of CFC rescue inhalers to save the ozone. This has widely been said to be false.
Go to this petition site, sign it if you have not yet done so, and call the PHARMACY AND GET YOURSELF SOME GOOD OLD-FASHIONED WARRICK CFC ALBUTEROL!
This is FOR REAL.
You'll need to fax a Rx the first time, of course.
Details right above where you sign the petition mid-page.
Go here for Warrick contact info:
http://tinyurl.com/3bul5u
1. Innocent people are dying because of the HFC inhalers.
2. HFC inhalers are GROSSLY INFERIOR to the CFC inhalers.
3. HFC inhalers are about 300% MORE EXPENSIVE than generic CFC inhalers.
4. "Hendeles noted that CFC inhalers release negligible amounts of the propellant, and do NOT pose a threat to ozone depletion." Leslie Hendeles, University of Florida professor of pharmacy and pediatrics, Science Daily March 30 2007.
cause.mission: bring back the Warrick CFC Albuterol inhalers and recall ALL HFC inhalers (Ventolin, Proventil, IVAX/ProAir, Armstrong, etc.)
cause.name: Bring Back Warrick CFC Albuterol Inhalers!
